unnormalised: Last year, during my trip to Vaishno Devi, the auto-rickshaw charged us Rs. 800 from Katra to Banganga; it was quite a rip-off at 6:00 AM. But the darshan made it worthwhile!
normalised: Last year, during my trip to Vaishno Devi, the auto-rickshaw charged us rupees eight hundred from Katra to Banganga; it was quite a rip-off at six zero zero A-M. But the darshan made it worthwhile!
